alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 2:02PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Scattered thunderstorms will impact portions of central Tooele County through 245 PM MDT... At 202 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered thunderstorms 17 miles south of Clive, or 26 miles northwest of Dugway English Village, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dugway English Village, Utah Test and Training Range South, Delle, Knolls, Clive, Skull Valley, Utah Test and Training Range North, Dugway Proving Ground Test Range and Bonneville Salt Flats. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 17 and 81. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys
